Posts.Content: Hi when I lost my hair I bought two wigs from "Simply Wigs". The quality was excellent I took them to my hairdressers who trimmed them to exactly fit my face. I had people ask me why I hadn't lost my hair when I had chemo. My hair has grown back now but I still sometimes wear my wig if I'm having a bad hair day.
Posts.Title: Where to buy wig? Feeling desperate and dishartened
